text: Hey everyone!

I’m Sam, the host of Reactions and I’ve
got some news.

So we’re going to be changing things up
a bit.

Next year we’ll be getting more in depth
on the science of what we cover, bringing

you chemistry stories you can’t get anywhere
else, and getting out from in front of this

green screen--maybe we’ll even go on a road
trip or two.

You might have noticed that we’ve already
been experimenting with these kinds of things
for the past couple of months.

And now we need your help, which means we
need your thoughts and ideas.

So as we’re updating we want to know: why
you first subscribed to this channel, and

if you feel like you’re getting what you
came for, what some of your favorite and least

favorite videos we’ve published in the last
few months have been, and if there is anything

else you want us to know or have been dying
to tell us about our content.
Please let us know in the comments.

Your input is really important to us because,
at the end of the day, all of this is for
you.

To make all these changes and whatever new
ones you all come up with, we’ll be going
dark in January and February.
No new videos.

But we’re also not dropping off the face
of the Earth.

We’ll be posting on social media and in
the community tab, so please give us a follow
to stay up to date!

We’re really, really psyched to bring you
a bunch of new content very soon.
